LanguageData.VBE_MakeLemonTea.label: make lemon tea
LanguageData.VBE_MakeLemonTea.description: Make a dark tea cut with water, chilled and garnished with a wedge of bright lemon.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeEarlGreyTea.label: make earl grey tea
LanguageData.VBE_MakeEarlGreyTea.description: Make a very strong and semi-sweet fruity tea. Floral notes dance around one's pallet at even the most dull scent. People who finish the drink feel strangely urged to colonize.
